content: What if you had the power to teleport to one place daily? Where would you go?
What if you could wake up tomorrow with any superpower? Which one would you choose?
What if you could control your dreams? What would you dream about?
What if you could spend a single day being completely invisible? How would you spend that day?
What if you could time travel to any period in the past or future? What period would you travel to?
What if you could only make one last trip in your life to a place you've never been? Where would you go?
What if you could live for 24 hours with absolutely no repercussions for any of your actions? How would you spend your day?
